overview:
Oz has been at the helm of new media initiatives for the past 15 years working with numerous fortune 1000 companies. Oz led emerging technology at Transworld entertainment; portions of MS Messenger; MS Eshop and MS Hailstorm. At Sapient, he led emerging technology for their digital agency practice and was involved with the re-design of the Bridgetrack Ad serving product. Recently Oz developed a suite of Web 2.0 and social media products for the Economist and EIU.

Currently, Oz currently heads up Strategy and Business Development for NOM Social Interactive, and advises a number of entertainment, Fashion 2.0 and social media startups. He also runs the NextWeb social media gatherings in NYC and Lunch 2.0â€™s on the East Coast.
